outline.text: Overview of generative AI features
Benefits of generative AI features
Turn off generative AI features
User Guidelines
Attributions
Feedback
Before You Begin
Get AI-generated answers
AI Assistant
1. Open a PDF and select AI Assistant in the global bar. To select multiple files, go to
2. Select Get started .
3. Select from the sample questions that are displayed based on the content of your PDF
4. The answer to your question is displayed. The relevant sources are marked with
Accessing chat history in Acrobat
Get AI-generated overviews and summaries
1. Open a PDF file and select the Generative summary icon in the navigation panel.
2. If prompted, select Get started .
3. An overview of the document is generated with section headings and summaries.
4. ( Optional ) To copy a specific summary, choose Copy , or choose Copy full
Streaming summaries for long PDFs
Acrobat
Prerequisites
1. In Acrobat Home, select Add meeting transcripts under Third-party apps .
2. Under the Microsoft Teams icon, select Sign in to Teams and enter your login
Access Zoom meeting transcripts in Acrobat
2. Under the Zoom app icon, select Learn more .
3. Follow the on-screen instructions to sign in to your Zoom web portal and download
Manually open meeting transcripts in Acrobat
Use generative AI features in Acrobat Reader
Like or dislike the response
1. To report accurate or inaccurate responses, select the like , or dislike option
2. To provide detailed feedback, select Tell us more .
3. Choose from the options, or provide details in the text box. Then select Submit .
Report inappropriate content
1. For the provided response, select Report .
2. Choose from the options, or provide details in the text box. Then select Submit
Rate your experience with the generative AI
features
Turn off generative AI features in Acrobat or Acrobat Reader
desktop
1. Close any open files. Then, navigate to Preferences > Generative AI .
2. To turn off the generative AI features, deselect Enable generative AI features in
3. To turn on the generative AI features again, select Enable generative AI features in
Turn off generative AI features in Acrobat on the web
1. Choose your profile at the upper-right corner, then select Settings .
2. Deselect Enable generative AI features in Acrobat , then select Save .
1. Open the document you want to work on, and then select AI Assistant .
2. Select Agree .
3. Enter your question in the message box. Alternatively, use voice commands to
4. The answer to your question is displayed. The relevant sources are indicated
Provide feedback for generated answers
1. Select the reference numbers given alongside the generated answers.
2. Long press anywhere inside the panel to get options to provide feedback.
Turn off AI Assistant
1. Select the profile icon on your device.
2. Select Preferences .
3. Select the toggle next to Enable generative AI features in Acrobat .
